entry.name: rotchiffre
entry.caption: Perform simple rotation cyphers.
entry.description:
The package defines a command \EdefRot that defines a macro (whose name is given as an argument) to the rotation of the given string. Available rotations are ROT13 (for letters), ROT5 (for digits), ROT18 (for digits and letters together) and ROT47 (for all ASCII characters).
The package is part of the oberdiek bundle.
